name: Let's Circle Back
description:
From: CGLabs_HQ

To: CGLabs_Staff
Re: Evacuation

Hi all,

Local organic harvesting on this planet has run into a few snags. We've initiated the self-destruct as a precaution.

If you wish to evacuate, please report to HQ within the next 5 minutes.

Regards,
CG Labs HQ

============================

Controls:
W to move forward
S to move backwards
Space to repair
Mouse to aim and shoot

Objective:
Repair your tank to full health before the timer runs out to win.

============================

Made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 47

Available in .exe and web (web is buggy - will fix soon)
